titleStmt.title: Good ale for my money. The good-fellowes resolution of strong ale, that cures his nose from looking pale. To the tune of, The countrey lasse.
titleStmt.author: L. P. (Laurence Price), fl. 1625-1680?

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Be merry my friends, and list a while ..."
In two parts, separated for mounting; woodcuts at head of each part.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
